option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Title="Select Workset" Height="350" Width="400" ResizeMode="NoResize" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen"> <Grid Margin="8"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<StackPanel Grid.Row="0" Orientation="Vertical"> <TextBlock Text="Select a user-created workset:" Margin="0,0,0,6" FontWeight="Bold"/> <!-- Added filter controls --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0,0,0,8"> <TextBox x:Name="txtFilter" Width="250" Height="22" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Type to filter workset names (case-insensitive)"/> <Button x:Name="btnClear" Width="60" Height="22" Margin="8,0,0,0">Clear</Button> </StackPanel> </StackPanel>
<!-- SelectionMode="None" is invalid in WPF; use a valid value (Single) --> <ListBox x:Name="lbWorksets" Grid.Row="1" MinHeight="200" SelectionMode="Multiple" />
<StackPanel Grid.Row="2" Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Margin="0,8,0,0"> <Button x:Name="btnHide" Width="75" Margin="0,0,8,0">Hide</Button> <Button x:Name="btnShow" Width="75" Margin="0,0,8,0">Show</Button> <Button x:Name="btnCancel" Width="75">Cancel</Button> </StackPanel> </Grid> </Window>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Title="Select Workset" Height="350" Width="400" ResizeMode="NoResize" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen"> <Grid Margin="8"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<StackPanel Grid.Row="0" Orientation="Vertical"> <TextBlock Text="Select a user-created workset:" Margin="0,0,0,6" FontWeight="Bold"/> <!-- Added filter controls --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0,0,0,8"> <TextBox x:Name="txtFilter" Width="250" Height="22" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Type to filter workset names (case-insensitive)"/> <Button x:Name="btnClear" Width="60" Height="22" Margin="8,0,0,0">Clear</Button> </StackPanel> </StackPanel>
<ListBox x:Name="lbWorksets" Grid.Row="1" MinHeight="200" SelectionMode="Multiple" />
<StackPanel Grid.Row="2" Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Margin="0,8,0,0"> <Button x:Name="btnHide" Width="75" Margin="0,0,8,0">Hide</Button> <Button x:Name="btnShow" Width="75" Margin="0,0,8,0">Show</Button> <Button x:Name="btnCancel" Width="75">Cancel</Button> </StackPanel> </Grid> </Window>

option.name: updatedContent
